document_data.name: Galados
document_data.mainbody:
'''Galados''' was a [[War Wizard]] from the shores of the [[Wyvernwater]]. In [[1369 DR]], he confronted [[Vangerdahast]] about what he believed to be the latter's attempt to become regent of [[Cormyr]].
